did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle:
Frederick Law Olmsted architectural drawings and plans,
1877-1927.
did.physdesc: Drawings, maps, negatives, manuscripts, reports, brochures.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Copies of sketches, planting plans, maps, and general plans of gardens, parks, private estates, and portions of cities with material from various firms. Also "Ancestral Register of Frederick Law Olmsted, c. 1592-1878," and reports and brochures dealing with Olmsted.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Copies of sketches, planting plans, maps, and general plans of gardens, parks, private estates, and portions of cities in Chicago, Boston, Long Island, Massachusetts, New York, Pennsylvania, and other places, with material from various firms, including Olmsted, Olmsted, and Eliot; F. L. Olmsted and Co.; F. L. and J. C. Olmsted; and Olmsted Brothers - Landscape Architects, run by Frederick Law Olmsted, Jr. and John Charles Olmsted;"Ancestral Register of Frederick Law Olmsted, c. 1592-1878," and reports and brochures dealing with Olmsted.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: F. L. and J. C. Olmsted.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Frederick Law Olmsted architectural drawings and plans, #462. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

defitem.label: Drawings are filed in folders by state as follows:

Series III. F. L. J. C. Olmsted
Series V. Olmsted Brothers - Landscape Architects
